nodes.text: R. Keevan was a Pantoran female starship captain for Chandrila Star Line. She served aboard the MPO-1400 Star Cruiser Halcyon during the war between the First Order and the Resistance.

A note was posted in Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu advertising a mechanic position on board the Halcyon and instructing applicants to contact Keevan. Strong, charismatic, and worldy, she was dedicated to her duty as captain and earned deep respect from her crew.

R. Keevan was first mentioned in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. She will be featured as a character in the upcoming immersive hotel experience Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser, set to open in 2022 at the Walt Disney World Resort. In audition sides posted for the character by The Walt Disney Company, Keevan thanks guests for assisting in the apprehension of outlaws on the Halcyon and makes reference to having served aboard the vessel for twenty years.
